title: kaNDu kaNDu nAn
sahitya:
kaNu kaNDu nAn kaLik-kUttADinEn kAmAriyai prEmAlayattil


anupallavi

  moNDu moNDu mUla shakti amuduNDu mummalam tavirttu ninmalamAghavE


caraNam    senru senru varum jIvap-paravai shivamayamAna nalam peravE
enrum azhiyAda inbattai nalgiDum idaya sabhApatiyai udaya sUriyan pOlE
